interactivity.requirements: 20 Kaori Affection You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " Everlasting Mercy " from Maya Makinami

progression.synopsis: Kaori is in a frenzy, as John has mysteriously disappeared while she was away at work. Sensei quickly makes his way over to her house to help find him. Upon stepping outside, though, both realize they have no idea where to begin looking. Kaori suggests they return to the alley where they first found him . Arriving there, Sensei translates John's confused monologue to Kaori, before he's no longer able to understand him and the three of them return home.

changelog: This Event was added in Update .23p2.
